entity.outcome:
Progressive Quality Gates system foundation successfully implemented and committed. 

Core components created:
- ProgressiveEngine: Main orchestrator with adaptive gate selection
- LevelSelector: Context-based gate level selection logic  
- ComplexityAnalyzer: Task and change complexity assessment
- Quality Gates module structure with full compilation success

Features implemented:
- Dynamic gate execution based on task complexity and risk
- Support for 8 different quality gate types (syntax, tests, security, etc.)
- Configurable failure handling and parallelization strategies
- Storage integration with caching for performance
- Mock implementations for immediate testing capability

Technical achievements:
- Full compilation with no errors (only warnings)
- Integration with existing ProgressiveGateConfig entity system
- Async execution framework with proper error handling
- Trait-based architecture for storage compatibility
- Extensible gate execution framework

Status: Foundation complete. Ready for CLI integration and real gate implementations.
entity.title: Implement Progressive Quality Gates System
